text: Uss jannat ki sift jiss ka perhezgaron say wada kiya gaya hai yeh hai kay uss mein pani ki nehren hain jo badboo kernay wala nahi aur doodh ki nehren hain jinka maza nahi badla aur sharab ki nehren hain jinn mein peenay walon kay liye bari lazzat hai aur nehren hain shehad ki jo boht saaf hain aur unn kay liye wahan her qisam kay meway hain aur unkay rab ki taraf say maghfirat hai kiya yeh misil iss kay hain jo hamesha aag mein rehnay wala hai? Aur jihen garam kholta hua pani pilaya jaye ga jo inn ki aanton kay tukray tukray ker dey ga
